targets.rawSql: SELECT $__dateBin(time) AS time, SUM(count) AS "HTTP RPS" FROM http_requests WHERE $__timeFilter(time) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1
targets.query: SELECT $__dateBin(time) AS time, SUM(count) AS "HTTP RPS" FROM http_requests WHERE $__timeFilter(time) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1

targets.rawSql: SELECT $__dateBin(time) AS time, SUM(count) AS "Socket Events/s" FROM socket_events WHERE $__timeFilter(time) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1
targets.query: SELECT $__dateBin(time) AS time, SUM(count) AS "Socket Events/s" FROM socket_events WHERE $__timeFilter(time) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1

targets.rawSql: WITH totals AS (SELECT $__dateBin(time) AS time, SUM(count) AS total FROM http_requests WHERE $__timeFilter(time) GROUP BY 1), errors AS (SELECT $__dateBin(time) AS time, SUM(count) AS errors FROM http_requests WHERE $__timeFilter(time) AND status_code LIKE '5%' GROUP BY 1) SELECT t.time, 100.0 * COALESCE(e.errors, 0) / NULLIF(t.total, 0) AS "HTTP 5xx Rate" FROM totals t LEFT JOIN errors e ON t.time = e.time ORDER BY t.time
targets.query: WITH totals AS (SELECT $__dateBin(time) AS time, SUM(count) AS total FROM http_requests WHERE $__timeFilter(time) GROUP BY 1), errors AS (SELECT $__dateBin(time) AS time, SUM(count) AS errors FROM http_requests WHERE $__timeFilter(time) AND status_code LIKE '5%' GROUP BY 1) SELECT t.time, 100.0 * COALESCE(e.errors, 0) / NULLIF(t.total, 0) AS "HTTP 5xx Rate" FROM totals t LEFT JOIN errors e ON t.time = e.time ORDER BY t.time

targets.rawSql: WITH totals AS (SELECT $__dateBin(time) AS time, SUM(count) AS total FROM socket_events WHERE $__timeFilter(time) GROUP BY 1), errors AS (SELECT $__dateBin(time) AS time, SUM(count) AS errors FROM socket_events WHERE $__timeFilter(time) AND status = 'error' GROUP BY 1) SELECT t.time, 100.0 * COALESCE(e.errors, 0) / NULLIF(t.total, 0) AS "Socket Error Rate" FROM totals t LEFT JOIN errors e ON t.time = e.time ORDER BY t.time
targets.query: WITH totals AS (SELECT $__dateBin(time) AS time, SUM(count) AS total FROM socket_events WHERE $__timeFilter(time) GROUP BY 1), errors AS (SELECT $__dateBin(time) AS time, SUM(count) AS errors FROM socket_events WHERE $__timeFilter(time) AND status = 'error' GROUP BY 1) SELECT t.time, 100.0 * COALESCE(e.errors, 0) / NULLIF(t.total, 0) AS "Socket Error Rate" FROM totals t LEFT JOIN errors e ON t.time = e.time ORDER BY t.time

panels.description: CPU usage per instance. Use the Instance dropdown to filter. Shows all instances when 'All' is selected.

targets.rawSql: SELECT $__dateBin(time) AS time, AVG(cpu_user_pct) AS "User CPU %", instance FROM system_metrics WHERE $__timeFilter(time) GROUP BY 1, instance ORDER BY 1
targets.query: SELECT $__dateBin(time) AS time, AVG(cpu_user_pct) AS "User CPU %", instance FROM system_metrics WHERE $__timeFilter(time) GROUP BY 1, instance ORDER BY 1

targets.rawSql: SELECT $__dateBin(time) AS time, AVG(cpu_system_pct) AS "System CPU %", instance FROM system_metrics WHERE $__timeFilter(time) GROUP BY 1, instance ORDER BY 1
targets.query: SELECT $__dateBin(time) AS time, AVG(cpu_system_pct) AS "System CPU %", instance FROM system_metrics WHERE $__timeFilter(time) GROUP BY 1, instance ORDER BY 1

panels.title: CPU Usage

panels.description: Memory usage per instance. Use the Instance dropdown to filter.

targets.rawSql: SELECT $__dateBin(time) AS time, AVG(rss_bytes) AS "RSS", instance FROM system_metrics WHERE $__timeFilter(time) GROUP BY 1, instance ORDER BY 1
targets.query: SELECT $__dateBin(time) AS time, AVG(rss_bytes) AS "RSS", instance FROM system_metrics WHERE $__timeFilter(time) GROUP BY 1, instance ORDER BY 1

targets.rawSql: SELECT $__dateBin(time) AS time, AVG(heap_used_bytes) AS "Heap Used", instance FROM system_metrics WHERE $__timeFilter(time) GROUP BY 1, instance ORDER BY 1
targets.query: SELECT $__dateBin(time) AS time, AVG(heap_used_bytes) AS "Heap Used", instance FROM system_metrics WHERE $__timeFilter(time) GROUP BY 1, instance ORDER BY 1

targets.rawSql: SELECT $__dateBin(time) AS time, AVG(heap_total_bytes) AS "Heap Total", instance FROM system_metrics WHERE $__timeFilter(time) GROUP BY 1, instance ORDER BY 1
targets.query: SELECT $__dateBin(time) AS time, AVG(heap_total_bytes) AS "Heap Total", instance FROM system_metrics WHERE $__timeFilter(time) GROUP BY 1, instance ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Memory Usage

panels.description: Event loop lag per instance. Use the Instance dropdown to filter.

targets.rawSql: SELECT $__dateBin(time) AS time, AVG(event_loop_lag_seconds) AS "Event Loop Lag", instance FROM system_metrics WHERE $__timeFilter(time) GROUP BY 1, instance ORDER BY 1
targets.query: SELECT $__dateBin(time) AS time, AVG(event_loop_lag_seconds) AS "Event Loop Lag", instance FROM system_metrics WHERE $__timeFilter(time) GROUP BY 1, instance ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Event Loop Lag

panels.description: Total CPU usage across all instances.

targets.rawSql: SELECT $__dateBin(time) AS time, SUM(cpu_user_pct) AS "Total User CPU %" FROM system_metrics WHERE $__timeFilter(time) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1
targets.query: SELECT $__dateBin(time) AS time, SUM(cpu_user_pct) AS "Total User CPU %" FROM system_metrics WHERE $__timeFilter(time) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1

targets.rawSql: SELECT $__dateBin(time) AS time, SUM(cpu_system_pct) AS "Total System CPU %" FROM system_metrics WHERE $__timeFilter(time) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1
targets.query: SELECT $__dateBin(time) AS time, SUM(cpu_system_pct) AS "Total System CPU %" FROM system_metrics WHERE $__timeFilter(time) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Total CPU Usage

panels.description: Total memory usage across all instances.

targets.rawSql: SELECT $__dateBin(time) AS time, SUM(rss_bytes) AS "Total RSS" FROM system_metrics WHERE $__timeFilter(time) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1
targets.query: SELECT $__dateBin(time) AS time, SUM(rss_bytes) AS "Total RSS" FROM system_metrics WHERE $__timeFilter(time) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Total Memory Usage

targets.rawSql: WITH latest AS (SELECT instance, online_sockets, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY instance ORDER BY time DESC) AS rn FROM system_metrics WHERE $__timeFilter(time)) SELECT NOW() AS time, SUM(online_sockets) AS "Total Online Sockets" FROM latest WHERE rn = 1
targets.query: WITH latest AS (SELECT instance, online_sockets, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY instance ORDER BY time DESC) AS rn FROM system_metrics WHERE $__timeFilter(time)) SELECT NOW() AS time, SUM(online_sockets) AS "Total Online Sockets" FROM latest WHERE rn = 1

targets.rawSql: WITH latest AS (SELECT instance, active_games, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY instance ORDER BY time DESC) AS rn FROM system_metrics WHERE $__timeFilter(time)) SELECT NOW() AS time, MAX(active_games) AS "Active Online Games" FROM latest WHERE rn = 1
targets.query: WITH latest AS (SELECT instance, active_games, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY instance ORDER BY time DESC) AS rn FROM system_metrics WHERE $__timeFilter(time)) SELECT NOW() AS time, MAX(active_games) AS "Active Online Games" FROM latest WHERE rn = 1

panels.description: Online WebSocket connections per instance and total across all instances.

targets.rawSql: SELECT $__dateBin(time) AS time, SUM(online_sockets) AS "Total" FROM system_metrics WHERE $__timeFilter(time) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1
targets.query: SELECT $__dateBin(time) AS time, SUM(online_sockets) AS "Total" FROM system_metrics WHERE $__timeFilter(time) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1

targets.rawSql: SELECT $__dateBin(time) AS time, AVG(online_sockets) AS "Sockets", instance FROM system_metrics WHERE $__timeFilter(time) GROUP BY 1, instance ORDER BY 1
targets.query: SELECT $__dateBin(time) AS time, AVG(online_sockets) AS "Sockets", instance FROM system_metrics WHERE $__timeFilter(time) GROUP BY 1, instance ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Online Sockets Over Time
